item.description:
You are invited to my home in Arlington for a Free Mini-Workshop put on by some colleagues of mine. While this is not a tantric event, it is focused on increasing the intimacy in your life within a safe, friendly, non-sexual environment. I highly encourage you to come get a taste of this work if you are at all curious about it. There is no fee for this event. You are welcome to bring guests.

Going Deeper into Love
an Evening Exploration

Join us for a free introductory event with the Human Awareness Institute (HAI).
In this mini-workshop you’ll have the opportunity to connect with others through verbal sharing
and exercises designed to open your heart. Come and get a taste of what you’ve been craving, in a
totally safe, non-sexual environment. Come and enjoy yourself.

Monday, September 21, 7-9:30 PM
Directions will be sent upon Registration. (MBTA accessible)

Discover how your beliefs about love, intimacy and sexuality affect your relationships, sexual
satisfaction, marriage, body image and ability to find love. Our personal relationship workshops
are about:

• Love, intimate and sexual relationships
• Improving body image to improve your relationships
• Making the right relationship choices for you
• Finding love, being honest and creating intimacy

The Human Awareness Institute (HAI) welcomes couples, singles and
non-traditional forms of relationships, without regard to sexual orientation or preferences.

Introductory events are the way we let people know about the type of
personal growth work that HAI offers in our Love, Intimacy and Sexuality (LIS) workshops.
For more information call us at 617-312-5692, email us at eastcoast-office@hai.org, or
visit our website at www.hai.org.
item.how_to_find_us: At private residence in Arlington Center. Address will be sent upon Regristration
item.name: Free Mini HAI Intro/Workshop: Going Deeper into Love
